long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use new tab as a quickly accessible place for keeping TODOs, notes and useful values that are not exactly worthy of persisting in your company's cloud.

This extension relies on localStorage. In future, it will likely use a more scalable IndexedDB API. There are no plans to persist data in any external storage.

Upcoming features:
* Filter tags based on currently open url, using predefined matchers
